docs.title: Coders for Causes Tech Docs
docs.text: A place for CFC committee to pass down their knowledge for all things technical.

docs.title: Contributions
docs.text: Hi! We are happy that you thought of contributing! If you have any suggestions or issues, please raise it here. I would be happy if you could provide pull requests, if you know how to do it here.

docs.title: Ye olde way
docs.text:
python -m venv .venv
./.venv/Scripts/activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
mkdocs serve

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. Very helpful when you want to take a look at the docs before deploying.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
  • mkdocs gh-deploy - Deploy in github pages
  • pip freeze > requirements.txt - Generate a requirements.txt file
